Text:
If it works then tell me, though I'm 95% it works...

Just copy the MobileForces.exe file into your installdir\system\ folder and overwrite! :)

"no new posting or registration will be permitted"

It says the forum can´t be posted on anymore, how can you write news there about ur remake?

I just registered the URL and linked it to www.mobileforces.org the abandoned forum, since I don't have a site yet. :)

Feel free to look at www.DOOMRemake.tk instead!
ahh I see ok mate can´t wait for the remake
Yeah! Did you get this game to work/what do you think about it?
ya works like it should, there were no servers though so I had to kick some bots =)

It's a real challange in singelplayer to complete all that!!

The master server is dead, so no multiplayer. But maybe "Open Location" will work if you know the ip of you friends server? :)

C ya, going to play it now!

Btw the website for the remake might be up sooner.
so what kind of remake will this be?
Total remake from scratch! Graphics will be Battlefield Vietnam alike :)

Just wanted to say that I have now started on the remake

Check www.mobileforces.tk in the coming months

rage that mad mobileforce still live becouse they whas with and made unreal turnament so i belive they are still working.
